title: Help cant open my client!!
body:
When i click on the league of legends client. I get a pop up saying "PVP.net patcher kernel has stopped working" 

i restarted my computer but it is not helping And i have no idea what to do to fix this,

replies.body:
Patcher Kernel errors usually pop up as a result of League missing certain operating privileges it relies on. This is typically resolved after working through the steps in our [**Permissions Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions), so I'd recommend you try those steps.

Let me know if this resolved the issue.
